Hey, it's Scott the WV PinballMap Admin here! I was in Keyser yesterday (09-28-19) and am here to report that (A). there might as well not be a left flipper at all on Corvette. All it is good for is letting the ball bounce over to the right flipper. (B). the machine leans WAY right. (C). You get .50 a play or 5 for 2.00. Great deal on a  machine that would play nice aside from the left flipper issue...
